reviewText: I always loved this band. Nuno Bettencourt's guitar would split my head open. It's great to see all the videos together, and the bonus concert footage is a nice touch, most of which I had never seen. I always appreciated the sense of humor the band had, as in Tragic Comic.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Good DVD -- comprehensive collection of videos from Extreme, one of the most underrated bands ever.  So much more than "More Than Words."
Title: N/A

reviewText: I only got this to watch nuno play. I wish I had heeded my wifes warning about the cheesy videos. All good though. I enjoyed the trip to the 90's
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have all of Extreme's music, as well as all of Nuno Bettencourt's solo, purchased this as is always enjoyable to watch video's, and Nuno is earth's most gorgeous creature, so this was a "girls just want to have fun" purchase..Nuno has the guitar hair flip down pat.....is a must have for Extreme fans I think...and is like going to an art museum watching Nuno.. buy it, watch it, feast your eyes...(the music of course, is awesome as always).
Title: N/A

reviewText: it's nice to see all the videos the band made but what this "definitve" collection really needs is more live footage of the band and perhaps an extensive interview.  It's good but not enough.
summary: I could do a better DEFINITIVE collection if someone would listen to me
Title: N/A
